column1: Uchi////My girlfriend and I came to Uchi to celebrate an exciting promotion. WOW were we impressed! We ordered a bottle of sake and split the 10 course omakase chefs tasting menu. Every dish was incredible and took us on a culinary journey through all tastes of the palate. Our server
column3: provided an astounding amount of information about our courses and was able to recommend specific dishes when we wanted to try something new. A wonderful experience... would highly recommend for any special occasion!
